text:
The sunlight is strong... let's rest in
the shade until we start shooting again.

──Oh, by the way,
about the paint story from before...

Toru said that mixing all the colors together
makes the same color as the outfit.

With light, if you mix all the colors together,
it turns white.
Haha, I looked it up a bit after that.

──Hehe, I wonder if I can become
light too.
